content: Hi! Thanks for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today? Are you looking for assistance with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC?
Um, I think it's my AC? It's just not cooling, I guess.
Thanks for letting me know! Could I have your name, please, so I can get started on your HVAC request?
Sure, it’s Megan. Sorry, my toddler is climbing on the couch right now.
Thank you, Megan! No worries at all. Could I please get your address so I can check if you're in our service area and get someone out to help with your AC?
Oh, um, it’s 788 Wilkins Street. Hang on—my kid needs me again. Sorry, I’ll be right back.
Thank you, Megan! I’ll hold on for you. When you’re back, I’ll just need to know when you’d ideally like us to come out to look at your AC.
Sorry, my son started crying and now we're about to leave for daycare. Can I get back to this later?
reason: Customer had to attend to child and is unable to continue at this time.
